message: Try the "Installation" topic if you're having trouble installing Diaspora.
Convore is a chat tool we're trying out as a way to communicate with our users, contributors, potential contributors, and the wider community.
Or the "Development" topic if you're interested in discussing code or figuring out how you can start hacking on it.
The "General / Miscellany" topic is for other stuff, such as harassing us about our choice of license(s), or talking about what Diaspora is relative to other projects.
And what about new user help?
@sircorby, I was thinking that could go in General / Miscellany. But you can feel free to create a new topic too.
This seems like a good place to talk about new user help. [:

I can't login at all. I know it is because my username is dropcase TheCrazyGM it will not take my email either in any case upper/lower/drop etc. I can do a password reset and that will force the login. I would like this fixed as I haven't been on for more than a week and am probably missing lots of conversations.  -- As a temporary fix, could one of the devs make my username all lowercase?
@sarahmei Sorry the login issue was to be directed to you. Any help would be nice.
@TheCrazyGM Done, your username is all lowercase now. I haven't changed a username permanently before so let me know if anything goes wrong.
I'll drop him a quick note - thanks @sarahmei
I'm new to Diaspora, mainly looking to help out with any end user testing, but am willing to help with pretty much everything.  Who should I talk to, or where should I look for what help is needed?
